definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the safety of fleroxacin injection for prevention of postoperative infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨氟罗沙星注射剂在预防术后感染中的安全性。

sentences.english: Some studies suggest the nasal mist is more effective than the traditional flu shot.
sentences.chinese: 某些研究表明，鼻喷雾剂比传统的流感注射剂更有效。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare Buflomedil Hydrochloride for Injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备盐酸丁咯地尔冻干注射剂。

sentences.english: A machine-vision-based intelligent inspection system for pharmaceutical injections is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了基于机器视觉的医药注射剂智能检测系统。

sentences.english: The injections and nonprescription pharmaceuticals shall, in addition, list the names of all supplementary materials in use.
sentences.chinese: 注射剂和非处方药还应当列出所用的全部辅料名称。

sentences.english: To establish a method for the determination of polysaccharides in Injectiones of Tremella medenterica.
sentences.chinese: 建立金耳多糖注射剂中的多糖含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the study of non-injections is another popular research topic.
sentences.chinese: 同时，胰岛素非注射剂型是研究的热门课题。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pharmacokinetics of netilmicin in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硫酸奈替米星注射剂在兔体内药物动力学。

sentences.english: The preparation technology of shikonin lipid emulsion.
sentences.chinese: 紫草脂肪乳液注射剂的制备。

sentences.english: Conclusion The application of this device can increase percent of pass in small dose injection.
sentences.chinese: 结论该设备的选择可提高小容量注射剂的合格率。

sentences.english: Objective Establish a method of determining Cefoperazone Injection by UV spectrophotometry .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立紫外分光光度法测定头孢哌酮注射剂含量。

sentences.english: Antineoplastic experiment of shikonin lipid emulsion in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 紫草脂肪乳液注射剂的体外抗肿瘤实验。

sentences.english: Injectables are recommended every four to five months.
sentences.chinese: 注射剂的话，建议是每4到5个月来一次。

sentences.english: The second part is TCMI theory research.
sentences.chinese: 其二为中药注射剂理论研究部分。

sentences.english: Most TCM injections are used to treat cardiovascular disease and inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的中药注射剂主要用于治疗心血管疾病和炎症。

sentences.english: At present, about 100 kinds of TCMI have been approved for manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 目前，批准生产的中药注射剂约有100多种。

definition: delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
